skillTree.name: Virtue of Empathy
skillTree.description: A champion of the common man, this duke is beloved by those he protects. Wherever he fights, the peasants doubles their efforts and will fight to the death rather than dishonour their lord.

skillTree.name: Royal Pegasus
skillTree.description: The purest of all pegasi, legend has it that they descend from Glorfinial, the mighty steed of a Grail Companion.

skillTree.name: Hippogryph
skillTree.description: Taming a mighty hippogryph presents a challenge that many Bretonnian lords cannot turn down.

skillTree.name: Lance of Bretonnia
skillTree.description: A Knightly formation, in the Lady's name, to smash through battle lines; to defeat evil in the field.

skillTree.name: The Blessing of the Lady
skillTree.description: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Blessing of the Lady"

skillTree.name: Lionhearted
skillTree.description: Like the lion, this one is the biggest and the bravest of his kind... with the sharpest teeth.

skillTree.name: Basic Training
skillTree.description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

skillTree.name: Lady’s Mantle
skillTree.description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

skillTree.name: Knights of Artois
skillTree.description: The Land of Artois is dominated by the dense and mysterious Forest of Arden. The Forest attracts many beasts, from beastmen to orcs and from time to time the Duke sends his knights to cleanse the forest, but it never ends.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for Questing Knights
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs. Large +15 for Questing Knights
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Questing Knights
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bow Masters
skillTree.description: "The flame of the Lady goes with this arrow, and so too the low-born archer before long…"

effects.description:
Range: +12% for Peasant Bowmen units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Peasant Bowmen units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Snipe for Bowmen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Respected, but Feared
skillTree.description: Chilfroy has never been heard to laugh and reputedly only smiles when surveying the devastation he has wrought on his enemies.

skillTree.name: Bane of Beasts
skillTree.description: Duke Chilfroy is a powerful and giant of a man who seeks pleasure in finding and killing the many beasts that lurks within the forest of Arden.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against Beastmen, Greenskins and Skaven
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Jousting Champion
skillTree.description: Chilfroy is renowned for his skill at the joust, like many of his forefathers have been.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Duke Chilfroy (while wielding Lance)
Melee defence: +8 for Duke Chilfroy (while wielding Lance)

Recruitment cost: -30% for Bretonnian horse cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Bretonnian horse cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Low-Born Militia
skillTree.description: Even stupid peasants can learn to stand fast and brace against the charge.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Peasant Proficiency
skillTree.description: Even dull and stupid peasants can aim a bow, but with a little training they can learn to shoot with some success.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Worshippers of the Grail
skillTree.description: Drink from the chalice. You will be reborn.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Glorfinial's Progeny
skillTree.description: The bloodline of the noblest of all steeds has been preserved; it serves us still.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guardians of the Lady
skillTree.description: Those who serve the Lady purely are rewarded with a portion of her strength when battle is joined.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Engines of War
skillTree.description: Although nothing can replace the thrill of the charge and the righteous clash of steel, seriously heavy artillery generally helps.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Peasant's Duty
skillTree.description: When the alternative probably involves being killed by their own side, the smallfolk tend to rise to the occasion...

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Protectors of the Realm
skillTree.description: There are literally no opponents too great for them to face down. None.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chivalric Code
skillTree.description: Thou shalt be everywhere and always the champion of the Right and the Good against Injustice and Evil.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guided by the Lady
skillTree.description: Many Bretonnian veterans speak of a soothing presence felt on occasion in the heat of battle, helping them to find their mark and keep their cool.

effects.description:
Range: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Justiciar
skillTree.description: As an expert in such matters, it is their duty to know the king's law and to mete justice in his name.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Tenth-Share
skillTree.description: The Lord is entitled to collect tithes from tenants in return for continued protection.

skillTree.name: Devoted of the Goddess
skillTree.description: They've seen the Lady's acts or witnessed her blessed grace.

skillTree.name: Duke of Bretonnia
skillTree.description: Dukes are the highest rank within Bretonnian society, second only to the Royarch himself.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Paladins
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Steward of the Realm
skillTree.description: "The land from here to the sea is yours, if you enforce the king's will."

skillTree.name: Lordly Conqueror
skillTree.description: The knowledge that they fight in the king's name, with his support, steels an army for the privations of the siege.

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.name: Bailiff
skillTree.description: Lords must not be concerned with the collecting of taxes; there are others whose lot it is to feel the people's scorn.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Duke of Artois
backgroundSkills.description: Chilfroy is a huge man, stronger and tougher than any of his knights or nobles. He is also famously grim: he has never been heard to laugh and reputedly only smiles when surveying the devastation he has wrought on his enemies.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Passive ability: "Antlers of the Great Hunt"

items.name: Antlers of the Great Hunt
items.description: Duke Chilfroy's helm is adorned with a splendid set of antlers taken from the quarry of a great hunt, slain by the Duke himself. The Antlers denote exceptional prowess as a horseman and hunter, and bestow virility and long life.

items.name: Lance of Artois
items.description: This was the lance used by Forgal de Artois, who became one of Gilles' Grail Companions. The Lance tip remains as sharp as it ever was, despite the passing of time.

factionEffects.title: Of the People, by the People
factionEffects.description: Unlike the lush meadows of Bretonnia's other Dukedoms, Artois is famous for being the only Dukedom that is covered entirely by forested wilderness, known by the Bretonnians as the Forest of Arden. Due to this, the Dukedom is in a constant state of warfare against tribes of Beastmen that have made the forest their new dark home.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +50% during forest battles
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Bowmen units
